appendix.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a small organ near your bowel, which has little or no use
appendix.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Christine had to go into hospital to have her appendix out  (=have it removed).
appendix.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a part at the end of a book containing additional information
appendix.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a part at the end of a book, document, or report, containing additional or useful information
appendix.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Further details of the 60 films used in this study are given in Appendix 2.
